summary: Rework the Fill Newspaper page's + button and option flow so it no longer auto-opens Add Newspaper; instead it should show an options menu, require PIN entry, and only navigate to Add Newspaper when the user selects "Add a Newspaper" after PIN validation.
architectural_notes: Navigation to Add Newspaper must be gated behind: '+' tap -> options menu -> PIN entry/validation -> explicit "Add a Newspaper" selection.
known_issues: Current behavior: tapping '+' immediately opens Add Newspaper instead of waiting for option selection after PIN entry.

existing_features.title: On the News page (Fill in your Newspaper flow), rebuild the floating “+” button interaction so it never opens the “Fill in your Newspaper” (Add a Newspaper) form directly. Clicking “+” must only open the PIN dialog.

Rework the PIN submit behavior on NewsPage so that after entering the correct PIN, the app shows only the Options UI (with “Add a Newspaper” and “Remove a Newspaper”) and does not automatically trigger either option due to keyboard events (e.g., pressing Enter in the PIN field).

Implement a single, explicit state-driven flow for the NewsPage management dialogs (PIN → Options → Add or Remove) that prevents conflicting dialog states (e.g., Options and Add open at the same time) and ensures consistent reset behavior when dialogs are closed.

new_feature_requests.summary: Redo the Fill Newspaper page '+' button/options system: do not auto-open Add Newspaper on '+' tap; show option menu, require PIN entry, and only open Add Newspaper when "Add a Newspaper" is selected after PIN validation.

projectName: Rework NewsPage “+” button PIN/options flow to prevent auto-opening Add Newspaper
